=Ubuntu Linux=

  * Server install from Ubuntu 6.06 Setup-CD
  * Installation of openssh, mysql, python-gdal, 686-kernel
  * Setup of VMWare-Server:http://www.howtoforge.com/ubuntu_vmware_server

  * GRANT INSERT, SELECT, UPDATE ON flightdb.* to 'flight'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY 'flyaway';
  * /etc/mysql/my.cnf -  add max_connections = 500
